price: 49. Tohuk lakat sinam rob edde geytaah kaxxa amna (agda) edde tamqe liggiday caxammixu edde yaxmuumeeni yamaate kaak iyye.
arabic: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٞ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatī min baʿdi dhālika ʿāmun fīhi yughāthu al-nāsu wafīhi yaʿṣirūna
